content.raw: @{557058:44b40072-c04b-41ae-ad09-376db9ebffa1} - thanks Kevin for confirmation. Would it have sense to change this behavior for “Cave Circuit” that `/subt/start` can start anybody, but `/subt/finish` is per robot? Or new `/sub/finish_part` ?? The motivation is that this is mainly for development/simulation because in the finals you would/should let the robots to use the whole simulation time, but for development it is chance to have faster feedback, if your runs are short?? Or it is bad idea?
content.html: @GoRobotGo - thanks Kevin for confirmation. Would it have sense to change this behavior for “Cave Circuit” that /subt/start can start anybody, but /subt/finish is per robot? Or new /sub/finish_part ?? The motivation is that this is mainly for development/simulation because in the finals you would/should let the robots to use the whole simulation time, but for development it is chance to have faster feedback, if your runs are short?? Or it is bad idea?
